    @allure.title('Test - 1.can not delete group associated with group 2.forceDelete')
    def test_create_cpe_filter(self,base_api):

        json_data = load_json(file_paths["static"])

        # create a group

        response_create = base_api.create_with_jsondata(endpoint,json_data,need_random=True, field="name")
        assert response_create.status_code == 200
        model_id = response_create.json()['_id']
    
        # create a workflow with this group
        workflow_endpoint = "workflow"
        json_data = load_json(file_paths["workflow"])
        json_data["groups"] = [model_id]
        json_data["actions"][0]["staticGroupId"] = static_group
        response = base_api.create_with_jsondata(workflow_endpoint,json_data,True,"name")
        assert response.status_code == 200
        workflow_id = response.json()['_id']
    
    
          # get the record of workflow
